Kim Yong Nam meets congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan
      Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and conversed with the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 51st anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK headed by Kwon Sun Hwi, vice-chairman of the central standing committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), now staying in the socialist motherland, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
